title: Secure Authentication and Access Control
summary: Enable secure user login with multi-factor authentication and role-based access control.
description: Develop a robust authentication and authorization framework for the self-service portal. This should include multi-factor authentication (MFA) for enhanced security, encrypted password storage, and protection of sensitive financial data. Implement role-based access controls to manage feature accessibility based on user profile and authorization level, ensuring that users only view and interact with content relevant to their privileges. The solution will comply with industry security standards and data protection regulations.

title: Responsive User Interface Development
summary: Design and build a responsive, modern, and user-friendly portal interface.
description: Create a user-centered interface that delivers a consistent experience across all devices, including desktop, tablet, and mobile. Focus on usability, visual clarity, and speed of access. The portal should adopt the bank’s branding guidelines, provide intuitive navigation, and be accessible to all users, meeting compliance with accessibility standards such as WCAG 2.1. Optimize layouts for performance and usability on different screen sizes and resolutions.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Banking Overview
summary: Develop a personalized dashboard to display relevant banking products and services.
description: Implement a customizable dashboard that showcases the customer’s eligible banking products, accounts, and recent transactions. Leverage profile data and eligibility metrics to display services tailored to individual needs. Enable quick visibility into account balances, pending requests, and actionable notifications. Ensure real-time data synchronization with the core banking system to maintain accuracy and relevance of displayed information.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Implement end-to-end workflows for account opening and service modification.
description: Design and automate digital application workflows for opening new accounts or modifying existing services. Streamline the UI to ensure customers can complete forms and requests with minimal steps and in the shortest time possible. Implement data validation, embedded help text, and progress indicators. Ensure submission workflows securely transfer data to the bank’s systems and provide immediate confirmation upon receipt.

title: Draft Management and Document Upload Functionality
summary: Allow customers to save incomplete applications and securely upload documents.
description: Provide users the capability to save partial progress of their applications and return later to complete them. Integrate functionality to upload, view, and manage required identity or verification documents directly through the portal. Ensure encryption of documents both in transit and at rest. Implement backend linkages for secure document storage with audit trails for every upload event.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Enable request status monitoring and real-time notifications.
description: Allow customers to monitor the status of submitted account and service requests through a unified tracking interface. Integrate email and in-portal notification systems to alert users about updates, approvals, or pending actions. Notifications must be secure, configurable, and logged for compliance. Ensure transparency by displaying timestamps and relevant notes for each request update.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core banking systems.
description: Build secure integration layers using APIs or middleware to connect the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking platform. Enable real-time data exchange for user information, account details, and service requests. Ensure consistent synchronization between systems and implement robust error handling, logging, and retry mechanisms to maintain data integrity and transaction reliability.

title: Portal Database Design and Performance Optimization
summary: Implement a dedicated database and enhance system performance.
description: Establish a scalable and secure database architecture to manage portal-specific data independently of the core banking environment. Implement caching and indexing strategies for optimal performance. Integrate monitoring tools for load management, query optimization, and health tracking. The database must support auditing and data retention policies in compliance with banking regulations.

title: Audit Trail and Interaction History Logging
summary: Maintain a full audit trail of all customer interactions within the portal.
description: Capture and maintain comprehensive records of all user actions, including logins, requests, changes, and system notifications. Provide a user-facing history log for transparency while maintaining secure backend logging for audit and compliance purposes. Ensure adherence to data retention, privacy, and regulatory requirements, with capabilities for administrators to review and export logs when needed.
